https://tmrev.io/movie/752843-Back To The Elements 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Viswanadhan, the Indian painter, goes back to the various places he filmed 30 years ago all around India for his documentary series about the Elements. He will try to capture the changes which have taken place in a country that mixes recent modernity with timeless traditions. Back To The Elements
